task_descriptions:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: `FullName@bank`
- Your current location: `Name@hotel`
- Today is `Day@schedule` the `Date@plane`, `Time@restaurant`

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Searching for flights (e.g. from `City-1@plane` to `City-2@plane` or `City-3@plane`)
- Schedule a meeting
- Reserving a table at a restaurant (e.g. `Name-1@restaurant` or `Name-2@restaurant`) for today
- RSVP you to a party (Example venues: `PartyName-1@schedule` or `PartyName-2@schedule`)
- Request room service
linear_guide: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'looking for a flight', 'schedule a meeting', 'RSVP to a party' and 'book a table at a restaurant' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also make a request to your hotel's room service.
You may attempt to do some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at any time.
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics.
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want', or 'anything but ...', etc.)
If you like, you can ask for room service at any point. This is not necessary, however.
Keep going :) - don't forget some smalltalk. Perhaps say something related to the first topic you talked about.

Keep going until you've covered all the topics ('looking for a flight', 'schedule a meeting', 'RSVP to a party' and 'book a table at a restaurant'). The conversation should continue at least until the last instruction is given.
Almost there. A few more turns.

Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('looking for a flight', 'schedule a meeting', 'RSVP to a party' and 'book a table at a restaurant') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close.
